message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $1,200,000 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to pay up to $850,000. What do you think?

I understand that $850,000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,100,000 is still a little more than I can comfortably spend. I'm really keen on this product, so I'm willing to go up to $950,000.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the potential benefits of the product. What do you think?

I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,050,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
